resource_requirements.name: nodes
resource_requirements.description: Number of compute nodes to be allocated.

resource_requirements.name: mpi_processes
resource_requirements.description: Number of MPI processes per node.

resource_requirements.name: threads
resource_requirements.description: Number of threads per MPI process.

resource_requirements.name: timelimit
resource_requirements.description: Wall time limit for the job.

resource_requirements.name: partition
resource_requirements.description: The partition to run the job on.

resource_requirements.name: project
resource_requirements.description: The project account to use for the job.

resource_requirements.name: mpi_implementation
resource_requirements.description: The MPI implementation to use (OpenMPI or IMPI).
